title: Ep 301: Joshua Tree Special - We Meet the Parents
itunes:title: Ep 301: Joshua Tree Special - We Meet the Parents
description:
Part 2 of the TigerBelly road trip in the desert! We meet Claudio... Rudy's boyfriend. We chat nightly gas fits, a Daniel Cormier love affair, goat sounds, and being visibly shaken by antiqutes. *Recorded 3/20/21

Watch the Joshua Tree Vlogs
